page.title: 10V. K. Mouldings, UFFCULME
page.content: V. K. Mouldings make fibre glass products. They manufacture surfboards, water tanks, company signs and window frames. Seven people are employed there altogether, three full time and two part time with two partners. The surfboards were the most interesting products, these are sold to a North Devon firm ,'Tiki', and up to twelve are made each week. There are ten stages in the manufacturing process and these were all explained to the children who visited. Raw materials come from GRP Bristol. The business was started seven years ago in Uffculme and they receive some local orders. The company is planning to expand next year. This will involve them moving to Cullompton as the present premises are too small. They will then instal a cold press moulder. Sixty different items made.
